title: Bug 11314 - Replace package name fragments should always be smaller
OB: The 'Replace package name fragments with:' field in the preferences (Java Work in progress) is replacing the package name fragment 'com.ibm.foobar' with 'co~.ib~.foobar'.
EB: The 'Replace package name fragments with:' field in the preferences (Java Work in progress) should only replace a package name fragment if the compressed name is actually smaller. Therefore, the package name fragment 'com.ibm.foobar' should not be compressed to 'co~.ib~.foobar'.
SR: To reproduce: Build version 20020214, enter '2~.' in the 'Replace package name fragments with:' field.
